H0.text: What was the last US state to reintroduce alcohol after prohibition. Oklahoma

H1.text: What was the last US state to reintroduce alcohol after prohibition. Kansas

H2.text: What was the last US state to reintroduce alcohol after prohibition. Mississippi

H3.text: What was the last US state to reintroduce alcohol after prohibition. Utah

A4.text: on December 5, 1933, the 21 members of the Utah delegation to the constitutional convention unanimously cast the 36th deciding state vote to repeal the Eighteenth Amendment and ratify the Twenty-first Amendment, thus repealing national alcohol prohibition.
